snippet.title: Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy | Hero Spotlight | Pontius the Knight
snippet.description:
Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy will release on August 31, 2023

He likes to fight and eat pie: Meet Pontius the Knight, Protector of the Realm, the frontline hero who is always going head first into battle with his trusty shield and sword. ⚔️

- Links & Info -
Website: https://trine5.thqnordic.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/trine
Steam: https://thqn.net/t5cc-steam

- Our Socials -
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic
Twitter: https://twitter.com/trineseries
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/trineseries
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic

#Trine #ClockworkConspiracy
